title: Course for Enhancing Visual Communication Design Competencies Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design principles and software application experience
context.additional_context: Mobile learning system operation combining theory and practice in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can produce design prototypes applying visual hierarchy with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can iteratively refine design solutions at least twice based on peer feedback.
Learners can complete at least 80% of microlearning content provided on a mobile learning platform and participate fully (100%) in real-time workshops.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
